name: 34th International Conference on Ocean, Offshore and Arctic Engineering
content: Join your colleagues from industry, academia and government at the ASME 2015 34th International Conference on Ocean, Offshore and Arctic Engineering (OMAE2015) in St. John's, Newfoundland, Canada from May 31 - June 5, 2015\. OMAE2015 is the ideal forum for researchers, engineers, managers, technicians and students from the scientific and industrial communities from around the world to: meet and present advances in technology and its scientific support; exchange ideas and experiences whilst promoting technological progress and its application in industry to promote international cooperation in ocean, offshore and arctic engineering.
